Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Central

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Kedzie, Jackson, California and Madison: due to, fire department activity near Madison/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my post?

 

#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both direction via Madison, Kedzie, Jackson, California, Madison and over regular route: due to, fire department activity near Madison/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Green Line trains between Ashland/63rd and Garfield
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Ashland/63rd and Garfield due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Ashland/63rd and Garfield due to signal problems.

As a result, trains are operating only between Harlem/Lake and 63rd/Cottage Grove at this time.

  • Shuttle buses are requested between Ashland/63rd and Garfield to provide connecting service in both directions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
